My Mama Dragon heart breathes fire when I see what is happening to Sara McBride. She is a fierce advocate. A trusted colleague. A thoughtful legislator. A responsible elected official. And she is someone's beloved daughter. We will always #FightLikeAMotherForTransRights for our children.
